# Resource Loading Request Identifiers

**API Collection**

Special values for the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceDataRequestID] identifier that are returned by asynchronous requests.

## Constants

- **PHInvalidAssetResourceDataRequestID**: The asynchronous resource loading request cannot be canceled.

## Constants

- **PHAssetResourceDataRequestID**: A numeric identifier for an asynchronous asset resource loading request.

items.description: The asynchronous resource loading request cannot be canceled.
items.name: PHInvalidAssetResourceDataRequestID

items.description: A numeric identifier for an asynchronous asset resource loading request.
